m_szDocSumamry: China Electric Car Sales Increased 223% In 2015 Originally published on EV Obsession . Electric vehicles captured a 1.4% share of China’s total auto market in December 2015 — equal to roughly 34,100 unit sales — according to EV-Volumes , an EV sales database and consultancy now partnering with EV Obsession  and CleanTechnica . The term “electric vehicles” refers here to so-called “new energy vehicles” (NEVs) — all-electrics, plug-in hybrids, and hydrogen fuel-cell vehicles.
